casebody.data:
BATES
v.
THOMAS-ARTHUR DIVISION. No. 93P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Justin Lee Phillips, Pro Se. Robert D. Hinshaw, Winston-Salem, for Thompson-Arthur Division, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of February 2007 by Plaintiffs for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of March 2007."
